nodes.text: Kibo Geothermal Station was a geothermal power plant on Ord Cestus. It was near Kibo Lake and west of the Zantay Hills.

The station consisted of a white duracrete dome with several high towers along its periphery. During the Uprisings it had been considered a likely target for the Desert Wind terrorist group; by 21 BBY it had been given additional security funds.
